content: marquise top by julia vaconsin this pretty top is worked from side to side in single_crochet through the back loop a couple of taller row make the bottom flare out by about 3 inches 8 cm the shell pattern on the front panels is laced up with a pretty ribbon this makes the top adjustable for different bust circumferences the baby version follows the same pattern but with a much smaller gauge difficulty level easy stitches some concentration needed for counting stitches you need to be familiar with foundation stitches if you search for foundation single_crochet or foundation stitches you will find several tutorials for this technique on the internet sizing - sizes s m l xl the adult version of the top is meant to be close fitting with little to no ease i recommend some positiv ease for the baby version be sure to review the finished measurements and choose the size that is closest to your actual bust size for a looser fit choose one size larger once you have determined the proper size go through and circle the size in the pattern for ease of use contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 1 adult version baby version finished bust fronts closed finished bust fronts closed 79 87 95 103 cm 49 5 54 5 59 5 64 5 cm 31 34 37 5 40 5 inches 19 5 21 5 23 5 25 5 inches to fit bust to fit ages 3/6 mo 12 mo 18 mo 24 mo 79-89 87-97 95-105 103-113 cm 31-35 34-38 37 5-41 40 5-44 5 inches yarn adult version baby version patons cotton 4ply 100% cotton 300m/328 altin basak maxi 100% mercerized cotton yards per 100g shade 1651 cream 3 3 3 565m/618 yards per 100g color 312 pink 1 4 skeins 1 2 2 skeins yardage for yarn subsitution adult version baby version 645 750 865 995 meters 485 560 645 745 meters 590 685 790 910 yards 445 510 590 680 yards 4ply or fingering weight cotton size 10 cotton thread suggested substitution yarns adult version baby version dale of norway stork coats & clark aida size 10 rowan 4ply cotton coats & clark royale classic crochet thread rowan ryc cashcotton 4 ply size 10 aunt lydia s fashion crochet size 3 aunt lydia s classic crochet size 10 schachenmayr nomotta catania dmc cébélia cotton size 10 dmc traditions crochet cotton hook adult version baby version 4 mm size g/6 1 75 mm us 4 uk 2 steel hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 2 notions 1 5 yards/meters of ¼ inch 0 6 cm ribbon 1 yard/meter of ¼ inch 0 6 cm ribbon gauge adult version baby version 23 5 sts x 20 row = 4 inches 10 cm in single_crochet 37 sts x 32 row = 4 inches 10 cm in single_crochet blo blo pattern notes the top is worked in two
